projects.title: Personal Website
projects.description: My very own website made from scratch using various modern web technologies. Also, the website you are currently on!

projects.title: C# University Project
projects.description: This project was strictly meant as an representation of the work I've done on my own university assignment. It is still highly incomplete, and rests in my GitHub page waiting for me to eventually complete it. Even though parts of it is perfectly refined to fit my own vision of the applications contained within, it is important to know that these aren't meant to be seen as enterprise quality or anything.

projects.title: C++ University Project
projects.description: My very first programming project as a whole. This currently lies archived in my GitHub repository, with absolutely no major changes planned for it. Please note that there are quite a few things that I could change as it is very much created from the mindset of a programmer just starting out, so please don't take this project too seriously.

projects.title: Android University Project
projects.description: My recently released Android Application. By far the most advanced and professional of the applications that I've released. Still needs to be refined.
